feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:48 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
